
# Elavon 
![elavoneu](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/elavoneu/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `elavoneu` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Elavon 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]   Elavon’s robust, secure and scalable award-winning international payment processing platform allows for efficient technology and compliance changes and provides advanced domestic, inter-regional and international card processing, with convenient multi-currency options. Elavon helps large companies and multi-nationals grow their businesses by providing multi-currency, cross-border and dynamic currency conversion services. Elavon helps small companies grow their businesses: ·         Through easy management, processing and acceptance of payments in person, online, mail order and phone. ·         By allowing them to accept payments wherever they are through Elavon’s MobileMerchant app.
